Ambos tendr\u00e1n que colaborar en la resoluci\u00f3n de una serie de asesinatos cometidos por un psic\u00f3pata que toma como base la relaci\u00f3n de los siete pecados capitales: gula, pereza, soberbia, avaricia, envidia, lujuria e ira. Los cuerpos de las v\u00edctimas, sobre los que el asesino se ensa\u00f1a de manera imp\u00fadica, se convertir\u00e1n para los polic\u00edas en un enigma que les obligar\u00e1 a viajar al horror y la barbarie m\u00e1s absoluta.","cast":[{"name":"Morgan Freeman","role":"Somerset","images":{"face":"\/bf\/0a\/bf0a290e08a74fe71bb91b76847fb95a.jpg"},"id":2935},{"name":"Andrew Kevin Walker","role":"Dead Man at 1st Crime Scene","images":null,"id":99417},{"name":"Daniel Zacapa","role":"Detective Taylor","images":null,"id":61524},{"name":"Brad Pitt","role":"Mills","images":{"face":"\/6e\/4d\/6e4d8d02ab0c956b076a0f71f0639746.jpg"},"id":1273},{"name":"Gwyneth Paltrow","role":"Tracy","images":{"face":"\/6c\/cf\/6ccf4708d4167d8ba7cde6e4c5b3c077.jpg"},"id":1520},{"name":"John Cassini","role":"Officer Davis","images":null,"id":56238},{"name":"Bob Mack","role":"Gluttony Victim","images":null},{"name":"Peter Crombie","role":"Dr. O'Neill","images":null,"id":99409},{"name":"Reg E.
